name: 里山のおと 夏草こみち
name_original: 里山のおと 夏草こみち
description:
"In the satoyama of japan, where nature and humans coexist in harmony.
There, a tanuki university was quietly opened,
Raccoon dogs and other creatures were studying human culture..."

The Novel Game "Satoyama note: Natsukusa Komichi" is a novel game about satoyama and its creatures.
Tanuki-kun, who studies human culture at Raccoon University, is in a great hurry to study for a test.
He remembers going to a summer festival with a fox and a frog.
Now, will the test go well?

Game Features

.
  • Novel game depicting the life of living creatures in Satoyama
  • Live background music by shinobue flute, world depicted by hand-drawn ink paintings
  • Collect illustrated books and try quiz games!
  • CG gallery and music player are included!


.
Story.
The film depicts the life and culture of satoyama creatures.
The story progresses from the perspectives of a raccoon dog, fox, frog, and human.
A nostalgic and relaxing story of everyday life.


.
Satoyama Illustrated books.
There are satoyama illustrated books scattered throughout the text of the story.
Let's find and collect them!


.
Satoyama Test.
Test your knowledge of Satoyama.
Try the quiz-style mini-game!


Extra.
See illustrations that were not used in the game,
You can listen to your favorite music with the music player!
